replies.body: Don't blink. Blink and you're dead. They are fast. Faster than you can believe. Don't turn your back. Don't look away. And don't blink. Good Luck.

{{champion:157}} {{champion:40}} 

Yasuo Passive and wind wall alongside Janna e allow them to avoid/catch/block all poke.

Janna Passive lets Yasuo stack his passive faster

The AD bonus early is great on Yas as he usually rushes Stattik first and it makes up for the loss in damage

Both Q's knock up for return poke and chain cc.

At level 6 there's a combined 5 seconds of cc with tons of damage. Alongside the heal, it's so difficult to peel or kill the Yasuo and the level 6 all in almost always nets a double

My friend and I have played this over 2 dozen times in norms and have only lost  once or twice.
